OrgName.entry: ST CHADS CHURCH 3RD AGE MINISTRY - BEFRIENDING

Desc.entry: A voluntary befriending scheme where church members visit housebound or lonely elderly people, aged 50 years and over, once a month. The scheme is confined to people living in Woodseats, Beauchief and Greenhill.

Telephone.entry: Mon, Tues, Thurs 10am-2pm, Fri 10am-12noon, and answerphone
